Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk libguestfs-winsupport
exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: libguestfs-winsupport bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description:
An updated libguests-winsupport package that fixes several bugs and adds various enhancements is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. The libguestfs-winsupport package adds support for Windows guests to libguestfs, a set of tools and libraries allowing users to access and modify virtual machine (VM) disk images.
The libguests-winsupport packages have been upgraded to upstream version 7.2, which provides a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous version. (BZ#1240277)
This update also fixes the following bug:
* Due to conflicting files, it was previously not possible to install libguestfs-winsupport together with the ntfs-3g package. With this update, libguestfs-winsupport has been modified not to contain the conflicting files. As a result, libguestfs-winsupport and ntfs-3g can be installed together as expected. (BZ#1190501)
In addition, this update adds the following enhancement:
* With this update, libguests-winsupport supports the 64-bit ARM architecture, which allows libguestfs to support Windows images on NTFS file systems. (BZ#1221583)
Users of libguests-winsupport are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which fixes these bugs and adds these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
